title: Ticket #157: coredumper won't build on openSUSE 11.1
description:
Nick reports that the coredumper doesn't build on openSUSE 11.1. It probably should. It's not yet a supported platform, but it's worth noting in case it becomes an issue in the future.

openSUSE 11.1, as installed on Nick's machine, has glibc "2.9-2.9" and GCC "4.3-34.243"
creator: adesmet
